thread.title: Back to the Future meets Grand Theft Auto 5 as fans create ultimate tribute video using game's film editor
thread.title_full: Back to the Future meets Grand Theft Auto 5 as fans create ultimate tribute video using game's film editor

author: Jeff Parsons
title: Back to the Future meets Grand Theft Auto 5 as fans create ultimate tribute video using game's film editor
text:
Back to the Future meets Grand Theft Auto 5 as fans create ultimate tribute video using game's film editor 11:08, 21 Oct 2015 What happens when you mix a cutting-edge video game with a much-loved 80's classic? Shares Get daily news by email Invalid e-mail Video loading 
Grand Theft Auto 5 isn't just about stealing cars, committing crimes and fighting epic turf wars. 
One fan has used the Rockstar game to completely re-create a key scene from the original Back to the Future movie. 
At first glance, it could be like you're watching the film itself. 
It's the famous moment when Marty McFly and Doc Brown first experiment with the time-travelling DeLorean car in an abandoned car park. YouTube/GTA Series Videos Marty and Doc as viewed through GTA V 
The video was published on YouTube earlier this week and has already achieved over 420,000 views at the time of writing. 
"GREAT SCOTT!! THIS IS HEAVY!" commented one impressed viewer. 
"It's a classic movie that practically defines what time travel is. I loved all three of them," wrote another. 
Today is the exact date that Marty and Doc travel to in Back to the Future II - and fans around the world are celebrating the iconic film series.
